name: Mia is Hungry!
description:
You are Mia! And you are Hungry!

Do not collide with the other cats to continue your run and collide with the food to eat and get a huge bonus in points! Relax and aim for that new highscore!

Controls: 

Press "A" and "D" on you keyboard to move left and right or touch / click on each side of the screen. Click on the Menu for pausing the game, checking out your highest score and turning the sound off.

Thank you for playing!
